```{r}
pacman::p_load(scatterPlotMatrix,
               parallelPlot, cluster, factoextra,
               tidyverse)
```

```{r}
wine <- read_csv("data/wine_quality.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = wine,
       aes(x = type)) +
  geom_bar()
```

```{r}
whitewine <- wine %>%
  filter(type == "white") %>%
  select(c(1:11))
```

```{r}
scatterPlotMatrix(whitewine, 
                  corrPlotType = "Text",
                  distribType = 1,
                  width = 500,
                  height = 500)

```

kclus2 \<- whitewine %\>%


fviz_cluster(kmeans4, data = whitewine)
```


wihtewine <- whitewine %>%
  mutate(Cluster - kmeans4$Cluster)
```


whitewine$Cluster <-
  as_factor(whitewine$cluster) #so it can only take whole number value
```
